channel.title: Vistex. It's All About Pk'ing
channel.description:
[center]Vistex[/center] [center][img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/fm3st1.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/bfhp49.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/2lk4heb.jpg[/img][/center] Forums: [url=http://www.vistexforums.com/]http://www.vistexforums.com/[/url] *WE HAVE A HOSTER ALONG WITH A VPS!* [center][img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/8639/informationf.jpg[/img][/center] [center]InTroducTion[/center] [center]Me and my good friend Stefano Have decided to create the ultimate pk'ing server. We currently have near to perfect combat and we are working on it more. We also are editing our skills. We are here for mostly a learning experience however we will be hosting this on a VPS soon. We have a domain and as you can see we are serious. Any suggestions please leave a comment below.[/center] [center][img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/3238/mediazf.jpg[/img][/center] [center]508 Maps: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/ml79j7.jpg[/img] Multi Barrage [img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/wcfe68.jpg[/img] Better Chars: [img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/b5jm9x.jpg[/img] Claws: [img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/14mys0n.jpg[/img] Range Hitsplat: [img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/15i3hg5.jpg[/img] Ags Spec: [img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/2cdizp3.jpg[/img] Korasi Spec: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/30n7j8h.jpg[/img] Magic Hitsplat: [img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/9h2kh2.jpg[/img] Some Items: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/244p14x.jpg[/img] New Right Clicks: [img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/2414ebs.jpg[/img] New prayer Book: [img]http://oi43.tinypic.com/2wod4ro.jpg[/img] New Curses Book: [img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/33a4gvn.jpg[/img] New Emote Tab: [img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/keb67l.jpg[/img] Shop: [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/dgm0qu.jpg[/img] [/center] [center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kVb_7oH2HtQ&context=C390955eADOEgsToPDskJj6sL1vjvE-_HjfM7GZZO_[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVdygEbBa28&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/Y3a2veMjJrE[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uLnIIV5U3N0&context=C4967c91ADvjVQa1PpcFMgze52erJLRHHRRO1x9N3e8wlbm3NfB4Q=[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E4INZedb7X0&feature=context&context=C4967c91ADvjVQa1PpcFMgze52erJLRHHRRO1x9N3e8wlbm3NfB4Q=[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BT8hwX6IuXY&feature=relmfu[/youtube][/center] [center]Spots Taken/Available:
Source Coders- 3/3 (Me) (Stefano) (Loveandpower) Client Coders- 1/2 (Loveandpower) Web Designer- 1/1 (Stefano) GFX Designer- 1/3 (Rambo)
If you would like to join this project please fill the information below corresponding to your position choice. Client Coder:
Name: Age: Msn: Skype: Experience: Position: Why do you want to join?
GFX Deigner:
Name: Age: Msn: Skype: Position: Some of your work:
Source Coder:
Name: Age: Msn: Skype: Experience: Position: Why do you want to join?
Thank you for your time. We would love if u suggest anything u would like to see. :D Msn: fmcomar@hotmail.com[/center] [center][img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/3142/creditsjf.jpg[/img][/center] [center]-Me -Stefano -Alex -liamp -Loveandpower -Sanity[/center]

item.title: Vistex. It's All About Pk'ing
item.dc:creator: @Compulsion Compulsion
item.description:
@Compulsion wrote:

Name: Steven Mejia
Age: 15
Msn: terror305@live.com
Skype: terror305
Experience: Going to be 1 year of Java programming on June 2012
Position: Client tweaker/server tweaker
Why do you want to join?
I want to join the development team of Vistex because I’ve always wanted to work with other experienced/professional developers on a server. I might not the best programmer but I can fix dupes/bugs on the server and code somewhat on the client. I think it’s better to work with people who’ve been programming for a longer duration than someone that run 100% leeched servers. I just want to learn.

Thanks for this prestigious opportunity,
Compulsion (btw im on Rune-Server more)

Read full topic

item.title: Vistex. It's All About Pk'ing
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

kill you704:

This is the funniest development page I have ever saw. NO OFFENSE at all, but you accepted over 10 people. You didn’t decline one person. Don’t you understand that you should only be working with people that can improve your server in a positive way. I can assure you that half of the people you accepted will some how find a way to ruin this by adding some crap then behind your back release it for better reputation. My advice, have a maximum of TWO server developers, not including yourself. But at the same time have ONE gfx creator, forum programmer, and all that little stuff that helps out the server. But these people do not get the files, I say this because some people give the files to people that make pictures which does not make any sense to me at all. Remember this is just what I think, and for me it usually turns out well. Also, almost every popular and well developed server (that doesn’t have an owner that pays for everything) is set up this way also. But honestly at least take my advice of limiting the people that have access to your source. I understand your probably going to flame me for saying this because you probably don’t want to listen to me say this stuff about your server, so I’ll stop now.

I understand what you mean, however I do not accept everyone. I add them and talk to them and that’s when I decide if they should be on the team or not and so far maybe 2 or 3 have been accepted. Also the source files will not shared with anyone except me or Stefano. Thanks for the comment anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Vistex. It's All About Pk'ing

@kill_you704 wrote:

This is the funniest development page I have ever saw. NO OFFENSE at all, but you accepted over 10 people. You didn’t decline one person. Don’t you understand that you should only be working with people that can improve your server in a positive way. I can assure you that half of the people you accepted will some how find a way to ruin this by adding some crap then behind your back release it for better reputation. My advice, have a maximum of TWO server developers, not including yourself. But at the same time have ONE gfx creator, forum programmer, and all that little stuff that helps out the server. But these people do not get the files, I say this because some people give the files to people that make pictures which does not make any sense to me at all. Remember this is just what I think, and for me it usually turns out well. Also, almost every popular and well developed server (that doesn’t have an owner that pays for everything) is set up this way also. But honestly at least take my advice of limiting the people that have access to your source. I understand your probably going to flame me for saying this because you probably don’t want to listen to me say this stuff about your server, so I’ll stop now.

Read full topic
